title: Bound
description: With the flames of love and lust articulately woven masterfully by these sensational bestselling authors, there is nothing more that you could ask for. Enjoy these terrific tales wherein the action packed drama and the tantalizing sequence of events will surely get you going. With these stories, you will witness the pull of sexual attraction along with the urge to enjoy these perfect tales dripping love, romance, and seduction. So, be all set to get lost in this world of fiction.
author: Sharon Green
